title: Moom
synopsis: Every forgotten object has a memory with its previous owner still attached. This is a story of Moom, one of those memories stuck in this world. One day, Moom meets another memory just like him.
staff: [['Kawamura, Genki', ['Producer', ' Original Creator']], ['Ishii, Tomohiko', ['Producer']], ['Kondo, Robert', ['Director']], ['Tsutsumi, Daisuke', ['Director']]]
